Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{3: 'With a sharp and heavy thud, the thick door to the hall opens, letting a hint of light inside the dark chamber. Hurried footsteps follow.'}
{3: 'As metal clashes with the stone floor, everything returns to silence.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I heard that we couldn\'t even fish out the remains of that team of "Gear"... Not even the Corrupted could escape from that flood of the Punishing Virus.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Standing next to Haicma is a beast mechanoid with the head of a hound and a humanoid body. He joined the Church of Machina not too long ago.'}
{3: 'Despite being a new member, Spooner seems to prefer hanging with Haicma, the lone wolf. According to him, "you\'re not as mad as the rest of them. I\'ve had my share of madmen."'}
{3: 'He bends down, reaching out and touching a crimson crystal shooting up from underground.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'It looks like... a plant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'How\'s "Lover" doing, Spooner?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'How would I know? Madam Arcana is fixing her right now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Didn't you check up on her before you left?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Hmph, I guess the infection wasn't as serious. Madam Arcana hooked up her memory shell with a music player. You can't imagine how funny it was with Zero screaming inside a CD player.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I've saved that video inside the central memory bank. I hope she'd reconsider the next time she's going to spill out nonsense.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I don't think that'll threaten her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Data analysis of this area is complete. The composition is still unknown, but it contains a high concentration of the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma lifts a finger. Her fingertip projects a waterfall of data as she transfers it to Spooner.'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'This level of concentration... It\'s going to instantly devour anyone trapped inside, no screw spared. It\'s not difficult to imagine how hard Zero\'s "Gear" got hit...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Haicma frowns slightly. Her system is retrieving the wireless signals that were sent and received nearby.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'What this flood can do to humans and Constructs is catastrophic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'We should also stay away from it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma watches the scarlet stream flowing past the plateau they are standing on.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'A fitting name.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma turns around and looks Spooner in the eye.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Humans have named it Red Tide.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Objective updated. We are to investigate the "Red Tide" appearing around the Church of Machina, recording and analyzing its data, and determining its cause and threat level.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "You take west; I'll take east. Let's get going.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Alright. Be careful.', 4: '2'}
